recipe.ingredients: - chicken breast (skinless and boneless): 1 pound - whole wheat tortillas: 4 - zucchini (sliced): 1 - yellow bell pepper (sliced): 1 - red onion (sliced): 1 - olive oil: 1 tablespoon - garlic powder: 1 teaspoon - paprika: 1 teaspoon - salt: 1/2 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/4 teaspoon - hummus: 4 tablespoons - spinach leaves: 1 cup
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Chicken and Vegetables: Season chicken breast with garlic powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper. In a grill pan, heat olive oil over medium heat and grill chicken for about 5-6 minutes on each side or until fully cooked. Remove and let it cool before slicing. Grill zucchini, yellow bell pepper, and red onion until they are soft and have grill marks. 2. Assemble Wraps: Spread 1 tablespoon of hummus on each whole wheat tortilla. Place an even layer of spinach leaves, followed by grilled chicken and vegetables. 3. Wrap and Pack: Roll up the tortillas tightly, wrap them in foil or cling wrap, and refrigerate. These wraps can be enjoyed cold or heated before serving.
recipe.nutrition: Total Carbohydrate: 34g, Dietary Fiber: 6g, Sodium: 492mg, Saturated Fat: 1g, Total Fat: 9g, Protein: 34g, Added Sugars: 0g, Total Sugars: 3g
recipe.total_calories_estimation: - Total Calories for entire recipe : Approximately 1368 calories for the entire recipe. - Calories for each ingredient: Chicken Breast: 749 calories for 1 pound Whole Wheat Tortillas: 356 calories for 4 tortillas Zucchini: 33 calories Yellow Bell Pepper: 50 calories Red Onion: 44 calories Olive Oil: 119 calories per tablespoon Garlic Powder, Paprika, Salt, Black Pepper: Negligible Hummus: 102 calories for 4 tablespoons Spinach Leaves: 7 calories for 1 cup - Serving People: 4
